title: Murder in the U.S. : number of victims by race/ethnicity and gender 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of victims on the Y-axis for 8 different Races for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Total had the maximum Number of victims among all 4 groups, and it was for Total. The minimum Number of victims was observed in Race Hispanic or Latino for Unknown.
Race Total and Unknown race had the biggest gap of 3121.0 between the highest and lowest Number of victims found for Female.
Averaging all 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown, the Race Total is the maximum Number of victims and Unknown race is the minimum Number of victims.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of victims on the Y-axis for 8 different Races for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown that are presented on the X-axis.
For Race Total, Total had the highest Number of victims 14123.0 among the 4 groups and in Hispanic or Latino, Unknown had the lowest Number of victims 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of victims on the Y-axis for 8 different Races for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Total had the maximum Number of victims among all 4 groups, and it was for Total. The minimum Number of victims was observed in Race Hispanic or Latino for Unknown.
Race Total and Unknown race had the biggest gap of 3121.0 between the highest and lowest Number of victims found for Female.
Averaging all 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown, the Race Total is the maximum Number of victims and Unknown race is the minimum Number of victims.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims for Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims for Race Hispanic or Latino.
Among all the Races, Female had the highest Number of victims 3180.0 in Race Total and lowest value 59.0 in Race Unknown race.
The maximum Number of victims for Female that was found in Race Total was 53.9 times larger than the minimum Number of victims observed in Race Unknown race.
Among all 4 groups, Total had the gap of 13890.0 between the maximum and minimum Number of victims observed in Race Total and Unknown race respectively.

In case of Race Total, Total had the highest Number of victims 14123.0 among the 4 groups and in Hispanic or Latino, Unknown had the lowest Number of victims 0.0. The second highest Number of victims 3180.0 was observed for Total in Race Total.
Averaging all 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown, the Race Total is the maximum Number of victims and Unknown race is the minimum Number of victims.
